sentences.en: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount . - --- Luce.
sentences.cn: 勇气是一架梯子,其他美德全靠它爬上去. --- 卢斯.

sentences.en: Facilitating Reach and setting LEAD goals for all Aqua Luce leaders.
sentences.cn: 为所有刃餐厅主管设定和帮助其实现领导目标.

sentences.en: Flower - de - luce climbed all the braes one by one to overlook the visit of darkness like Psalters.
sentences.cn: 鸢尾花渐次爬上所有的山坡,眺望黑色的诗篇降临.

sentences.en: He could order a dinner almost as well as Mr. Luce.
sentences.cn: 他点菜的本领几乎可以与卢斯先生媲美.

sentences.en: In the meantime Henry Luce's Time and Life magazines, while often disregarding their own correspondents?
sentences.cn: 当时鼓吹援蒋的还有亨利·斯的《时代》和《生活》杂志, 这两家杂志常常把自家记者发回的报导丢在一边不用,却特派蒲立特去中国采访.

sentences.en: Lord Luce's capitulation to pressure from the Duke of Edinburgh has stored up huge problems for the future.
sentences.cn: 卢斯勋爵迫于爱丁堡公爵的压力作了让步，为日后埋下了巨大隐患。

sentences.en: Luce achieved much in his life.
Luce tried to use his magazines to convert Americans to his ideas.
sentences.cn: 是鲁斯和哈登在耶鲁大学接受的古典教育的遗存.

sentences.en: This is all perfectly sensible, but not all of Luce's arguments are rock solid.
sentences.cn: 这些建议都相当合理, 但卢斯的观点并非全都不可辨驳.
